SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" b JOIN "MEMBER" m ON (b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN "BLOG" bl ON (b.BOARD_NO = bl.BOARD_NO)
JOIN "USER_SCRAP" us ON (b.BOARD_NO = us.TARGET_NO AND us.TYPE = '1')
WHERE b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND (bl.TEMP_FL IS NULL OR bl.TEMP_FL = 'N')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (
SELECT US.TARGET_NO AS boardNo, US.TYPE AS type,
CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN B.BOARD_TITLE WHEN US.TYPE = '2' THEN J.POSTING_TITLE END AS boardTitle,
CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(B.BOARD_CONTENT, 600, 1) WHEN US.TYPE = '2' THEN '채용공고 입니다.' END AS boardContent,
CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN TO_CHAR(B.B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') WHEN US.TYPE = '2' THEN J.APPLY_END END AS bCreateDate,
CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN B.BOARD_COUNT ELSE 0 END AS boardCount, CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) ELSE 0 END AS likeCount, CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') ELSE 0 END AS commentCount,
CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN (SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0) WHEN US.TYPE = '2' THEN NULL END AS thumbnailUrl,
CASE WHEN US.TYPE = '1' THEN B.BOARD_CODE ELSE 0 END AS "boardCode",
'N' AS isPaid, NULL AS tagsStr
FROM USER_SCRAP US LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON (US.TARGET_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND US.TYPE = '1') LEFT JOIN JOB_POSTING J ON (US.TARGET_NO = J.POSTING_NO AND US.TYPE = '2')
WHERE US.MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo}
ORDER BY US.SCRAP_NO DESC
SELECT b.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, '1' AS type, b.BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.BOARD_CONTENT, 600, 1) AS boardContent, b.BOARD_COUNT AS boardCount, TO_CHAR(b.B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS bCreateDate, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, m.MEMBER_EMAIL AS memberEmail, b.BOARD_CODE AS boardCode,
(SELECT i.IMG_PATH || i.IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG i WHERE i.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO AND i.IMG_ORDER = 0) AS thumbnailUrl,
(SELECT LISTAGG(T.TAG_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY BT.TAG_NO) FROM BLOG_TAG BT JOIN TAG T ON BT.TAG_NO = T.TAG_NO WHERE BT.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) AS tagsStr,
bl.IS_PAID AS isPaid, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" c WHERE c.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO AND c.COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') AS commentCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" l WHERE l.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) AS likeCount FROM "BOARD" b JOIN "MEMBER" m ON b.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN "BLOG" bl ON b.BOARD_NO = bl.BOARD_NO
WHERE b.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND (bl.TEMP_FL IS NULL OR bl.TEMP_FL = 'N') AND b.BOARD_CODE = 1 AND m.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{blogId}
AND bl.IS_PAID = 'Y'
AND (b.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR b.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
AND b.BOARD_NO IN ( SELECT BT.BOARD_NO FROM BLOG_TAG BT JOIN TAG T ON BT.TAG_NO = T.TAG_NO WHERE T.TAG_NAME = #{tag} )
ORDER BY b.BOARD_COUNT DESC, b.BOARD_NO DESC ORDER BY likeCount DESC, b.BOARD_NO DESC ORDER BY b.BOARD_NO DESC
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
